title: Scp 8642 9
content:
You take a seat at the table near the kitchenette. It’s not your job to investigate what this department does, just how they spend their money. Minutes pass as you zone out to the sound of rustling papers and typing keys. The rich aroma of coffee wafts through the air. Just as your mind begins to wander with renewed thoughts of investigation, you hear a smooth voice saying, “Here, you look like you could use this.”

You turn to see the absolute most attractive person you’ve ever seen. Not just conventionally physically attractive (though they are that as well), but something in the shine of their eyes and the angle of their smile absolutely captivates you. No, not just that, you decide. It’s something more, something totally indescribable, like every choice you’ve made in life has been leading to this meeting with this one person. So awestruck by this angel are you that it takes you an embarrassingly long time to realize that they are holding two mugs of coffee and offering one to you. Taking a deep breath to steady yourself, you…

||= [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8642/offset/10 Accept the coffee.]||= 9||= [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8642/offset/11 Decline the coffee.]||

-----

author: TopHatBionicle
